Hi guys, I don’t want to talk about bad things, but I have to, it all started with the fact that VALVE for no reason updated de_dust2, having lost a lot of players on it, then added updates that were unnecessary to anyone and then added two cases for one month that spoil the economy of the game, in each of these cases new knives, VALVE also added three AWPs in a short period of time, in general, I only play with friends in CS: GO, because it makes no sense to go alone, there are a lot of cheaters on the Prime account. Guys, if you like the game - play, but for me it has long died...
